word: \93Has not our Lord Jesus carried up our flesh into Heaven?\94 said Knox, the Scotch reformer, \93and shall he not return? We know that he shall return, and that with expedition.\94 Ridley and Latimer, who laid down their lives for the truth, looked in faith for the Lord's coming. Ridley wrote: \93The world without doubt\97this I do believe, and therefore I say it\97draws to an end. Let us with John, the servant of God, cry in our hearts unto our Saviour Christ, Come, Lord Jesus, come.\94
